title: Elizabeth Wang Acupuncture
cleaned_text: | | | | Manhattan: | | Elizabeth Wang Acupuncture Center for Palliative & Preventative Care Here at Elizabeth Wang Acupuncture, we are dedicated to providing our patients with compassionate care through traditional eastern medicine techniques supplemented with today's modern technology. Dr. Elizabeth Wang is licensed to practice acupuncture in New York State. She has been in practice for over 20 years and has developed mastery over Acupuncture, Herbal Therapy, Cupping, Tui Na, and Gua Sha to treat a wide range of health problems inlcuding chronic pain, obesity, infertility, menstrual disorders, and diseases of the immune system. She received her OMD in the prestigous Changchun University of Chinese Medicine. Following her graduation, she had three more years of advanced study in herbology. She is Vice President of United Aliance of New York Acupunctureist. | | © 2013 Top Herb LLC All rights reserved.
